# name of project
PROJECT(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1)

# use CMake provided script to locate FLTK
FIND_PACKAGE(FLTK REQUIRED)

# add include paths
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_SOURCE_DIR}
                    ${FLTK_INCLUDE_DIR})

# compile network version if ICE is available
if (CISST_MTS_HAS_ICE)

  # CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
  FLTK_WRAP_UI(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P2 C3UI.fl serverUI.fl)

  # name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
  ADD_EXECUTABLE(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P2
                 # code files to compile
                 fltkMutex.cpp
                 C2ServerTask.cpp
                 C3Task.cpp
                 P2main.cpp
                 # header files are provided for information
                 fltkMutex.h
                 C2ServerTask.h
                 C3Task.h
                 # files generated by fluid
                 ${multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P2_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	         )
  # this program 
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P2 ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

  # link with the cisst libraries
  CISST_REQUIRES("multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P2" "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")


  # CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
  FLTK_WRAP_UI(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P1 C1UI.fl C2ClientUI.fl)

  # name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
  ADD_EXECUTABLE(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P1
                 # code files to compile
                 fltkMutex.cpp
                 C1Task.cpp
                 C2ClientTask.cpp
                 P1main.cpp
                 # header files are provided for information
                 fltkMutex.h
                 C1Task.h
                 C2ClientTask.h
                 # files generated by fluid
                 ${multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P1_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	         )
  # this program 
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P1 ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

  # link with the cisst libraries
  CISST_REQUIRES("multiTaskTutorialExample9-1_P1" "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")

endif (CISST_MTS_HAS_ICE)
